revision.comment: Robot - Moving category Sierra Leonean football clubs to [[:Category:Football clubs in Sierra Leone]] per [[WP:CFD|CFD]] at [[Wikipedia:Categories for discussion/Log/2012 January 12]].
revision.text:
{{Football club infobox | clubname = Yambatue Stars | image = | fullname = | nickname = The Scorpions| founded = | ground = [[Moyamba Football Ground]]
[[Moyamba]], [[Sierra Leone]]| capacity = | Owner = | manager = | league = [[Sierra Leone National First Division]]| season = 2007/08 | position = | pattern_la1=|pattern_b1=|pattern_ra1=| leftarm1=000000|body1=000000|rightarm1=000000|shorts1=000000|socks1=000000| }} '''The Yambatui Stars of Moyamba''' is a [[Sierra Leonean]] [[Association football|football]] club based in [[Moyamba]], [[Moyamba District]], [[Sierra Leone]]. The club represents the Moyamba District and is currently playing in the [[Sierra Leone National First Division]], the second highest football league in Sierra Leone. Yambatui Stars is the biggest and most popular football club from Moyamba and gets almost all of its support from the [[Moyamba District]], where it is based. ==External links== *http://www.rsssf.com/tabless/sier07.html [[Category:Football clubs in Sierra Leone]] {{SierraLeone-footyclub-stub}}

{{Use dmy dates|date=April 2013}} {{Infobox football club | clubname = Zawisza Bydgoszcz | image = Zawisza Bydgoszcz vector.svg | image_size = 160px | fullname = SP Zawisza Bydgoszcz | nickname = ''Wojskowi'' ("Military"), ''Niebiesko-Czarni'' ("Blue-Black"),
''Rycerze Pomorza'' ("Knights of Pomerania") | founded = 1946 | ground = [[Zdzisław Krzyszkowiak Stadium]] | capacity = 20,247 | chairman = ? | manager = {{flagicon|POL}} Jacek Łukomski | league = Klasa okręgowa (VI level) | season = 2017–18 | position = A-Klasa Bydgoszcz (VII level), 1st | website = http://www.zawisza.bydgoszcz.eu | pattern_la1=|pattern_b1=_blackstripes|pattern_ra1= | leftarm1=000000|body1=0000FF|rightarm1=000000|shorts1=000000|socks1=000000 | pattern_la2=|pattern_b2=_bluedoubleline |pattern_ra2= | leftarm2=FFFFFF|body2=FFFFFF|rightarm2=FFFFFF|shorts2=FFFFFF | socks2=FFFFFF |pattern_so2=_bluehorizontal | pattern_la3=|pattern_b3=_bluehalf|pattern_ra3= | leftarm3=000000|body3=000000|rightarm3=0000FF|shorts3=FFFFFF | socks3=0000FF |pattern_so3=_hoops_black | current = 2014–15 Ekstraklasa }} '''Zawisza Bydgoszcz''' ({{IPA-pl|zaˈviʂa ˈbɨdɡɔʂt͡ʂ}}) is a sports club from [[Bydgoszcz]], [[Poland]], founded in 1946. Its name commemorates a legendary Polish 15th-century knight, [[Zawisza Czarny]] (Zawisza the Black). The club holds many sections: football, track and field athletics, boxing, rowing, canoeing, weightlifting, gymnastics, shooting, and parachuting ones.{{Cite web |url=http://www.zawisza.info/zawisza,bydgoszcz,opis,historia |title=Archived copy |access-date=19 April 2015 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150406045929/http://zawisza.info/zawisza%2Cbydgoszcz%2Copis%2Chistoria |archive-date=6 April 2015 |dead-url=yes |df=dmy-all }} ==History== [[File:Finał Pucharu Polski (14095363261).jpg|thumb|240px|Polish cup winners 2014]] The team was founded in 1946, as a [[Polish Army|military]]-sponsored club in [[Koszalin]], although they only played friendly matches initially. When the army headquarters moved to [[Bydgoszcz]] a year later in 1947 the club followed.{{cite web|url=https://int.soccerway.com/teams/poland/sp-zawisza-bydgoszcz/6570/|title=WKS Zawisza Bydgoszcz|work=Soccerway|publisher=Perform|accessdate=16 April 2015|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150417113539/http://int.soccerway.com/teams/poland/sp-zawisza-bydgoszcz/6570/|archive-date=17 April 2015|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} The football team has achieved some successes, playing for several years in the [[Ekstraklasa|Polish First Division]], first winning promotion in 1961. They reached the semi-finals of the [[Polish Cup]] in 1991{{cite web|url=http://www.90minut.pl/strona.php?id=rozgrywki_pp|title=90minut.pl|first=Maciej|last=Kusina|date=|work=90minut.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160921053628/http://www.90minut.pl/strona.php?id=rozgrywki_pp|archive-date=21 September 2016|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} and competed in [[1993 Intertoto Cup]].{{cite web|url=http://www.mogiel.net/EC/intertoto-history/1993.php|title=Intertoto Cup 1993|author=|date=|work=mogiel.net|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160801163824/http://mogiel.net/EC/intertoto-history/1993.php|archive-date=1 August 2016|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} Zawisza was relegated from the Second Level to Fourth Level in the 1997–98 season. In 2001, they controversially merged with [[Chemik Bydgoszcz (football)|Chemik Bydgoszcz]], and played as '''Chemik-Zawisza''', whilst the reserve team was initially meant to be called '''Zawisza-Chemik''', although ultimately the reserved team remained as simply "Zawisza". The merger turned out to be very unsuccessful, and the senior side started anew from the bottom of the [[Promotion and relegation|league pyramid]] reverting to "Chemik", leaving the reserve team in the fifth division, which subsequently became Zawisza's senior team.{{cite web|url=http://www.90minut.pl/skarb.php?id_klub=786|title=Skarb - Chemik/Zawisza Bydgoszcz|first=Maciej|last=Kusina|date=|work=90minut.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20170202021833/http://www.90minut.pl/skarb.php?id_klub=786|archive-date=2 February 2017|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} Aside from the ongoing Hydrobudowa scandal between 2006 and 2008, the original team were promoted to the Third Level after finishing 1st in their regional Group of the 3rd liga in the 2007–2008 season.{{cite web|url=http://www.90minut.pl/liga/0/liga3375.html|title=IV liga 2007/2008, grupa: kujawsko-pomorska|first=Maciej|last=Kusina|date=|work=90minut.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160723095327/http://www.90minut.pl/liga/0/liga3375.html|archive-date=23 July 2016|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} On 12 June 2011, after a 13-year absence, Zawisza was promoted to the [[I liga (Poland)|Second Division]] after finishing second 5 points behind [[Olimpia Grudziądz]] in the [[II liga (Poland)|Third Division West]] in the 2010–11 season.{{cite web|url=http://www.90minut.pl/liga/0/liga5033.html|title=II liga 2010/2011, grupa: zachodnia|first=Maciej|last=Kusina|date=|work=90minut.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20170326015523/http://www.90minut.pl/liga/0/liga5033.html|archive-date=26 March 2017|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} In 2013 Zawisza won the Polish Second Division and were promoted.{{cite web|url=http://www.rsssf.com/tablesp/pol2champ.html|title=Poland 2nd Division Champions|last=Gwidon Naskrent|date=29 September 2013|work=RSSSF|accessdate=19 October 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20120130091424/http://www.rsssf.com/tablesp/pol2champ.html|archive-date=30 January 2012|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} They won the [[Polish Cup]] in the 2013–14 season, 6–5 on penalties after a goalless 120 minutes against [[Zagłębie Lubin]],{{cite web|url=http://eurosport.onet.pl/pilka-nozna/liga-europy/puchar-polski-rzuty-karne-rozstrzygnely-historyczny-final-zawisza-bydgoszcz-zdobywca/d568z|title=Puchar Polski: rzuty karne rozstrzygnęły historyczny finał, Zawisza Bydgoszcz zdobywcą trofeum|author=|date=2 May 2014|work=onet.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20170202015335/http://eurosport.onet.pl/pilka-nozna/liga-europy/puchar-polski-rzuty-karne-rozstrzygnely-historyczny-final-zawisza-bydgoszcz-zdobywca/d568z|archive-date=2 February 2017|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}}{{cite web|url=http://ekstraklasa.net/final-pp-skrot-meczu-zaglebie-lubin-zawisza-bydgoszcz-wideo,artykul.html?material_id=5363fcbfbb9d3a461546bd1b|title=Finał PP: Skrót meczu Zagłębie Lubin - Zawisza Bydgoszcz (WIDEO)|first=TVN|last=Turbo/X-news|date=|work=ekstraklasa.net|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150419152045/http://ekstraklasa.net/final-pp-skrot-meczu-zaglebie-lubin-zawisza-bydgoszcz-wideo,artykul.html?material_id=5363fcbfbb9d3a461546bd1b|archive-date=19 April 2015|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} and qualified to [[UEFA Europe League]] second qualifying round.{{cite web|url=http://www.90minut.pl/liga/0/liga7475.html|title=Liga Europy 2014/2015|first=Maciej|last=Kusina|date=|work=90minut.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20170117184709/http://www.90minut.pl/liga/0/liga7475.html|archive-date=17 January 2017|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} After the club had finished 5th in [[2015–16 I liga]], it did not receive a license for the following season due to financial problems and dissolved. The refounded club '''SP Zawisza''' started the 2016-17 season in Klasa B, grupa Bydgoszcz III which is in the 8th tier of Polish football.{{cite web|title=Klasa B 2016/2017, grupa: Bydgoszcz III|url=http://www.90minut.pl/liga/0/liga9231.html|website=www.90minut.pl|language=pl|access-date=30 August 2016|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160901004925/http://www.90minut.pl/liga/0/liga9231.html|archive-date=1 September 2016|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} Zawisza's under-19 team won the national youth championship in 1981.{{cite web|url=http://www.90minut.pl/skarb.php?id_klub=444|title=WKS Zawisza Bydgoszcz Spółka Akcyjna|date=|work=90minut.pl|accessdate=6 March 2017|language=Polish|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20170807152550/http://www.90minut.pl/skarb.php?id_klub=444|archive-date=7 August 2017|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} ===Hydrobudowa=== '''Zawisza Bydgoszcz SA''' was a club that was created when [[Kujawiak Włocławek]] were moved to [[Bydgoszcz]] and renamed by Hydrobudowa, their owners. The original Zawisza Bydgoszcz continued playing in the fourth division.{{cite web|url=http://bydgoszcz.gazeta.pl/bydgoszcz/1,35591,3095744.html |title=Archived copy |accessdate=21 August 2014 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140826114717/http://bydgoszcz.gazeta.pl/bydgoszcz/1,35591,3095744.html |archivedate=26 August 2014 }} however the new club had a very similar logo and an identical name. As a result, Kujawiak, Zawisza and supporters all over the country boycotted the relocated team.{{cite web|url=http://zawiszafans.net/news/289_JEDNAK_ZAWISZAHYDROBUDOWA_BYDGOSZCZ_.html|title=ZawiszaFans|author=|date=|work=zawiszafans.net|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160924130151/http://zawiszafans.net/news/289_JEDNAK_ZAWISZAHYDROBUDOWA_BYDGOSZCZ_.html|archive-date=24 September 2016|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} The reserve team continued to play under the name Kujawiak Włocławek in the Fourth Polish league. Many considered this club to be a continuation of Zawisza.{{citation needed|date=January 2017}} The club lasted two seasons in the [[I liga (Poland)|Second Division]],{{cite web|url=http://www.90minut.pl/skarb.php?id_klub=10421|title=Skarb - Zawisza Bydgoszcz (2)|first=Maciej|last=Kusina|date=|work=90minut.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20170202021743/http://www.90minut.pl/skarb.php?id_klub=10421|archive-date=2 February 2017|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} before it folded in 2007{{cite web|url=http://www.90minut.pl/news.php?id=520821|title=Zawisza (2) oficjalnie wycofany z II ligi|first=Maciej|last=Kusina|date=|work=90minut.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160918055219/http://www.90minut.pl/news.php?id=520821|archive-date=18 September 2016|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} as a result of serious corruption allegationshttp://wiadomosci.gazeta.pl/kraj/1,34309,3891344.html{{dead link|date=July 2016 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=yes }} and widespread condemnation.http://wiadomosci.gazeta.pl/kraj/1,34309,3890948.html{{dead link|date=July 2016 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=yes }} ==Crest== Zawisza's crest has changed several times.{{cite web|url=http://polskielogo.net/zawisza-bydgoszcz/|title=Rycerz z wojskowym rodowodem|date=|work=polskielogo.net|accessdate=22 December 2017|language=Polish|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20171222220130/http://polskielogo.net/zawisza-bydgoszcz/|archive-date=22 December 2017|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} {{gallery |title=Zawisza Bydgoszcz logo history |width=80 |height=70 |align=center |File:Zawisza Logo.svg |1946–50
2014-16 ''(minor variations over the years)'' |File:OWKS Bydgoszcz.png|1950–54 |File:CWKS Bydgoszcz.png|1954-57 |File:Zawisza Bydgoszcz3.png|1957–76 |File:Zawisza Bydgoszcz vector.svg|2003–14
2016– ''(minor proportional variations over the years)'' }} ==Supporters== The fan movement at Zawisza started in the 1970s, one of the first clubs with organised support in the country. Since then club has always attracted a large support considering its relative lack of success. The club enjoys support from around [[Cuiavia]], with fan-clubs in several other major towns, most notably in [[Inowrocław]], [[Janikowo]], [[Nakło nad Notecią|Nakło]] and [[Mogilno]], among several others.{{cite web|url=http://zawiszafans.net/historia|title=ZawiszaFans|author=|date=|work=zawiszafans.net|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20170128092340/http://zawiszafans.net/historia|archive-date=28 January 2017|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} The fans have good relations with fans of [[ŁKS Łódź]], [[GKS Tychy]], [[Zagłębie Lubin]] and [[Górnik Wałbrzych (football)|Górnik Wałbrzych]]. Their arch-rivals are fellow locals [[Polonia Bydgoszcz]], with whom they contest the [[Local Derbies In Poland|Bydgoszcz Derby]], and regional rivals [[Elana Toruń]], with whom they play the [[Local Derbies In Poland|Cuiavian Derby]], with the [[Toruń]] and [[Bydgoszcz]] rivalry between the two cities one which goes even beyond sport.{{cite web |url=http://www.polityka.pl/tygodnikpolityka/portretymiast/1571489,1,bydgoszcz-i-torun----wieczna-rywalizacja.read |title=Bydgoszcz i Toruń – wieczna rywalizacja | Jak Tyfus z Krzyżakiem |publisher=Polityka.pl |date= |accessdate=2015-10-16 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160304050726/http://www.polityka.pl/tygodnikpolityka/portretymiast/1571489,1,bydgoszcz-i-torun----wieczna-rywalizacja.read |archive-date=4 March 2016 |dead-url=no |df=dmy-all }} ===Protests=== [[File:Zawisza Logo.svg|160px|right|thumb|The club's alternate logo]] In the 21st Century, the Zawisza fans have encountered numerous challenges from owners, city council, politicians and the media, frequently battling against them for public support.To My Kibice no.3(162), March 2015, pp.28–39 First they opposed the controversial merger with [[Chemik Bydgoszcz (football)|Chemik Bydgoszcz]] in 2001, choosing to boycott the new merged club (which turned out to be hugely unsuccessful) and support the reserve team which still played under the Zawisza name. In 2006, the fans opposed the [[Zawisza Bydgoszcz#Hydrobudowa|new relocated Zawisza]], again opting to continue to support the original team made up of the reserve squad. When the "new Zawisza" failed to win any trophies and was embroiled in a match-fixing scandal, subsequently folding, the fans triumphantly announced victory against the media and politicians who supported it. In 2008, the fans protested against the city council which was insistent on renaming the newly rebuilt stadium as the "Municipal Stadium", with the fans claiming that to omit any link to Zawisza was unfair. In 2014, the fans began to boycott matches after a match against [[Widzew Łódź]]. The fans claim that the police assaulted fans, when preventing Zawisza and [[ŁKS Łódź]] fans from entering the stadium.{{cite web |url=http://pilkarskaprawda.pl/news/Radoslaw-Osuch-vs-kibice-Zawiszy-Historia-konfliktu-cz-1-3307 |title=Archived copy |accessdate=2015-09-27 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150928170701/http://pilkarskaprawda.pl/news/Radoslaw-Osuch-vs-kibice-Zawiszy-Historia-konfliktu-cz-1-3307 |archivedate=28 September 2015 |df=dmy-all }} Following the incident, the fans asked to see the security footage, however, the footage was claimed to be lost due to an alleged "technical fault".{{Cite web |url=http://pilkarskaprawda.pl/news/Radoslaw-Osuch-vs-kibice-czesc-II-3314 |title=Archived copy |access-date=15 April 2015 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150928175122/http://pilkarskaprawda.pl/news/Radoslaw-Osuch-vs-kibice-czesc-II-3314 |archive-date=28 September 2015 |dead-url=no |df=dmy-all }} The club chairman, Radosław Osuch, and a large portion of the media{{cite web|url=http://katowickisport.pl/zawisza-bydgoszcz-w-swietle-konfliktu-na-linii-klub-kibice,artykul,559229,1,12675.html|title=Zawisza dzielny. I Osuch też|author=|date=|work=katowickisport.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150928011336/http://katowickisport.pl/zawisza-bydgoszcz-w-swietle-konfliktu-na-linii-klub-kibice,artykul,559229,1,12675.html|archive-date=28 September 2015|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}} and public opinion, attributed the incident to [[football hooliganism]].{{cite web|url=http://m.bydgoszcz.gazeta.pl/bydgoszcz/1,106753,15029609,Osuch_kontra_kibole__Poczatek_wojny_o_Zawisze.html|title=Osuch kontra kibole. Początek wojny o Zawiszę|author=|date=|work=gazeta.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150416010937/http://m.bydgoszcz.gazeta.pl/bydgoszcz/1,106753,15029609,Osuch_kontra_kibole__Poczatek_wojny_o_Zawisze.html|archive-date=16 April 2015|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} The players supported the chairman,{{cite web|url=http://express.bydgoski.pl/326297,Groby-z-inicjalami-Osucha-i-pilkarzy-Kibole-Zawiszy-nie-daja-o-sobie-zapomniec.html|title=Groby z inicjałami Osucha i piłkarzy. Kibole Zawiszy nie dają o sobie zapomnieć|first=|last=redakcja|date=|work=bydgoski.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160304132113/http://express.bydgoski.pl/326297,Groby-z-inicjalami-Osucha-i-pilkarzy-Kibole-Zawiszy-nie-daja-o-sobie-zapomniec.html|archive-date=4 March 2016|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}}{{cite web|url=http://ekstraklasa.net/pilkarze-zawiszy-zbluzgani-w-krakowie-przez-wlasnych-kibicow-komentarz,artykul.html?material_id=5301fb3cbb9d3a3f60527590|title=Piłkarze Zawiszy zbluzgani w Krakowie przez własnych kibiców (KOMENTARZ)|first=Szymon|last=Jaroszyk|date=|work=ekstraklasa.net|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150416021748/http://ekstraklasa.net/pilkarze-zawiszy-zbluzgani-w-krakowie-przez-wlasnych-kibicow-komentarz,artykul.html?material_id=5301fb3cbb9d3a3f60527590|archive-date=16 April 2015|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} sparking fury from the fans.{{cite web|url=http://www.sportowefakty.pl/pilka-nozna/409414/to-juz-koniec-bydgoskiej-trybuny-b-kibice-zastraszaja-pilkarzy|title=To już koniec bydgoskiej Trybuny B: Kibice zastraszają piłkarzy? - WP SportoweFakty|first=Grupa Wirtualna|last=Polska|date=11 January 2014|work=sportowefakty.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017}} Osuch threatened to relocate the club, and has openly declared war against the fans{{cite web|url=http://weszlo.com/2013/12/17/do-konca-roku-decyzja-osucha-albo-zostanie-albo-przeniesie-klub/|title=Do końca roku decyzja Osucha. Albo zostanie, albo przeniesie klub...|author=|date=17 December 2013|work=weszlo.com|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160617132439/http://weszlo.com/2013/12/17/do-konca-roku-decyzja-osucha-albo-zostanie-albo-przeniesie-klub/|archive-date=17 June 2016|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} He changed the club crest to the similar crest used by the [[Zawisza Bydgoszcz#Hydrobudowa|relocated Zawisza in 2006]], further angering the fans.{{cite web|url=http://www.stadionowioprawcy.net/news/1272-osuch_zmienil_herb_zawiszy_.html|title=Osuch zmienił herb Zawiszy!|author=|date=|work=stadionowioprawcy.net|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160508080712/http://www.stadionowioprawcy.net/news/1272-osuch_zmienil_herb_zawiszy_.html|archive-date=8 May 2016|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}} Since 2014, the boycott has been upheld, meaning that there has been low attendances and support during matches,{{cite web|url=http://www.stadionowioprawcy.net/news/1805-zawisza_bydgoszcz_gornik_leczna_13_02_2015.html|title=Zawisza Bydgoszcz - Górnik Łęczna 13.02.2015|author=|date=|work=stadionowioprawcy.net|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160508093309/http://www.stadionowioprawcy.net/news/1805-zawisza_bydgoszcz_gornik_leczna_13_02_2015.html|archive-date=8 May 2016|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}} including the historic [[Polish Cup]] win. In January 2015, a group of fans broke into the stadium and placed 15 coffins on the pitch, depicting 14 players and the chairman, and a banner with the words ''"Osuch's whore spares, you are morally dead"'', as a protest against the chairman and the players.{{cite web|url=https://uk.eurosport.yahoo.com/blogs/early-doors/fans-of-polish-side-zawisza-bydgoszcz-broke-into-club-s-stadium-and-left-coffins-on-the-pitch-for-each-player-183140263.html|title=Fans of Polish side Zawisza Bydgoszcz broke into club's stadium and left coffins on the pitch for each player|date=31 January 2015|work=Early Doors|publisher=Eurosport|accessdate=16 April 2015|archive-url=https://archive.is/20150416153801/https://uk.eurosport.yahoo.com/blogs/early-doors/fans-of-polish-side-zawisza-bydgoszcz-broke-into-club-s-stadium-and-left-coffins-on-the-pitch-for-each-player-183140263.html|archive-date=16 April 2015|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} The club issued a criminal investigation into the incident.{{cite web|url=http://www.sportowefakty.pl/pilka-nozna/500209/trwaja-przesluchania-ws-trumien-na-stadionie-zawiszy-bydgoszcz-jedna-osoba-z-zar|title=Trwają przesłuchania ws. trumien na stadionie Zawiszy Bydgoszcz. Jedna osoba z zarzutami - WP SportoweFakty|first=Grupa Wirtualna|last=Polska|date=10 February 2015|work=sportowefakty.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150710004750/http://www.sportowefakty.pl/pilka-nozna/500209/trwaja-przesluchania-ws-trumien-na-stadionie-zawiszy-bydgoszcz-jedna-osoba-z-zar|archive-date=10 July 2015|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}}{{cite web|url=http://www.sportowefakty.pl/pilka-nozna/495630/policja-szuka-sprawcow-incydentu-na-stadionie-zawiszy-grozi-im-nawet-5-lat-wiezi|title=Policja szuka sprawców skandalicznego incydentu na stadionie Zawiszy. Grozi im nawet 5 lat więzienia - WP SportoweFakty|first=Grupa Wirtualna|last=Polska|date=21 January 2015|work=sportowefakty.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150418182014/http://www.sportowefakty.pl/pilka-nozna/495630/policja-szuka-sprawcow-incydentu-na-stadionie-zawiszy-grozi-im-nawet-5-lat-wiezi|archive-date=18 April 2015|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} In May 2015, after Górnik Łęczna keeper [[Sergiusz Prusak]] displayed a T-shirt showing his support to the Zawisza fans, the Zawisza fans decided to break their boycott for one match only to come and thank him in a match against Górnik. In order to prevent the fans from coming to Zawisza, Osuch subsequently raised the match ticket price to a very high 200[[złoty|zł]] in order to stop the fans attending.{{cite web|url=http://www.pomorska.pl/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=/20150521/PILKA10/150529834|title=Ceny podniesione. Bilet normalny na mecz Zawisza - Górnik za 200 złotych!|author=|date=|work=pomorska.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150522002815/http://www.pomorska.pl/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=%2F20150521%2FPILKA10%2F150529834|archive-date=22 May 2015|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} After 5 years, Osuch decided to leave the club,{{cite web|url=http://sportowefakty.wp.pl/pilka-nozna/603685/radoslaw-osuch-przestal-byc-wlascicielem-zawiszy|title=Radosław Osuch przestał być właścicielem Zawiszy! - WP SportoweFakty|first=Grupa Wirtualna|last=Polska|date=24 May 2016|work=wp.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20161221044508/http://sportowefakty.wp.pl/pilka-nozna/603685/radoslaw-osuch-przestal-byc-wlascicielem-zawiszy|archive-date=21 December 2016|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} however upon this announcement the players and staff also all resigned.{{cite web|url=http://www.gol24.pl/ekstraklasa/a/osuch-odejdzie-z-zawiszy-jesli-tak-to-pilkarze-i-trenerzy-razem-z-nim-oswiadczenie,9579606/|title=Osuch odejdzie z Zawiszy? Jeśli tak, to piłkarze i trenerzy razem z nim! (OŚWIADCZENIE)|first=|last=psz|date=|work=gol24.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20161220200611/http://www.gol24.pl/ekstraklasa/a/osuch-odejdzie-z-zawiszy-jesli-tak-to-pilkarze-i-trenerzy-razem-z-nim-oswiadczenie,9579606/|archive-date=20 December 2016|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} Without investment, the club was disbanded by Osuch as last act, stating that there is a poor atmosphere surrounding Polish football.{{cite web|url=http://www.pb.pl/1315543,90873,zawisza-bydgoszcz-sa-wycofal-zespol-z-ii-ligi|title=Zawisza Bydgoszcz SA wycofał zespół z II ligi|author=|date=|work=pb.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20161220133930/http://www.pb.pl/1315543,90873,zawisza-bydgoszcz-sa-wycofal-zespol-z-ii-ligi|archive-date=20 December 2016|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} The fans reformed the club and had to start the new season from the lowest level on the [[football pyramid]].{{cite web|url=http://www.przegladsportowy.pl/pilka-nozna/nizsze-ligi,zawisza-bydgoszcz-rozpoczal-sezon-w-b-klasie,artykul,715049,1,292.html|title=Zawisza jednak nie zginął|author=|date=|work=przegladsportowy.pl|accessdate=23 January 2017|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20161221124333/http://www.przegladsportowy.pl/pilka-nozna/nizsze-ligi,zawisza-bydgoszcz-rozpoczal-sezon-w-b-klasie,artykul,715049,1,292.html|archive-date=21 December 2016|dead-url=no|df=dmy-all}} ==Ground== [[File:Bydgoszcz - Stadion Zawiszy.jpg|600px|thumb|center|[[Zdzisław Krzyszkowiak Stadium]]]] ==European record== {| class="wikitable" !
